channel.title: Client help plz
channel.description:
hi i am currently working on a server using this source and client ,
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,436600.0/topicseen.html
the client for it , (which is bluurs) only has class folders in it but when i decompile them then compile them , i get 100 errors .
i would like to use this client if possible (bluurs clean client) i get auto logged off after 2 seconds , Yes i have the skull / head icon shit done in Player.java
http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-client/downloads/211483-clean-bluurs-client.html
can someone please help me get my source compatible with bluurs clean client or decompile all the .class files for me ?
thanks ,
